SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BasketballBet
Represents a basketball betting option with specific odds and available choices.
Bet
Represents a generic betting option for a sports game, with specific odds, choices, and a result that can be set once the game outcome is determined.
BetMain
Entry point for simulating a betting organization, generating random game results, and calculating and displaying customer betting results.
BetOrganization
Singleton class representing the organization responsible for managing customer betting activities.
Customer
Represents a customer with betting capabilities, including a list of bets, total gains, and spending information.
CustomerBet
Represents a customer's individual bet, including the bet details, stake amount, choice, and potential payout.
CustomerType
Enum representing the types of customers, primarily used to determine betting limits.
DummyData
A utility class for generating dummy data to simulate betting scenarios, including predefined football and basketball bets and customer data.
FootballBet
Represents a football betting option with specific odds and three possible outcomes.
GameEmulator
Singleton class for emulating game results by randomly selecting outcomes for a list of bets.
GoldCustomer
Represents a Gold-level customer, a specialized type of Customer with enhanced betting limits.
ICustomerBetService
Interface for customer betting services, defining methods for calculating gains and presenting results, as well as a default method for saving results to a text file.
IGiveBetList
Interface for classes that provide access to a list of customer bets.
PlatinumCustomer
Represents a Platinum-level customer, a specialized type of Customer with the highest betting limits.
